channel.title: Player v Npc
channel.description:
[Delta based] Well when I try to use a special attack from any weapon on an npc it just says connection lost but it works fine pvp.. Please help me.
Edit: I did this tut http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,370299.0.html To make me go next to npc to attack. But now it doesn't work...
EDIT: I removed a piece of code, now I just can't attack.

item.title: Player v Npc
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

Edit: I can’t even attack npc without dcing.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 08, 2009, 09:05:55 pm[/size][hr]bump please help

Read full topic

item.title: Player v Npc
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

You’re sure it happens with every special attack you try to use on an NPC? Because if that’s true then it means you’ve edited something you shouldn’t have needed to.

Read full topic

item.title: Player v Npc

item.description:

Yeah they’re in there :s

item.title: Player v Npc
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Well I don’t see any problems with that… Have you put all the weapon IDs which have special attacks into special.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Player v Npc
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

It’s for all weapons so here is the dds code if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); npcDamage(8); } not sure if that is the right one but.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:
